page.title: 03SURVEY OF STIRCHES.
page.content: We compiled a survey to find out more about the people who live in Stirches estate. Out of 75 households interviewed we found that: (a) Virtually everybody enjoyed living on the estate. (b) Most had children and that the ages of these children varied from under school age to well over l6.(c) Almost everyone would have liked a shop on the estate. A Community Centre would also have been popular but only about half requested a pub on the estate. (d) Most people have lived here over five years which suggests most people moved into the estate when the houses were new. (e) Most people had lived in Hawick before they moved to Stirches. Only about a third of Stirches residents were incomers to Hawick.
